title: Bloomberg Markets: Verizon Wrests Straight Path From AT&T
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Verizon Wrests Straight Path From AT&T
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alex Sherman Reporter:Mergers & Acquisitions Bloomberg News Discussing Verizon Communications, the largest U.S. wireless carrier won a protracted bidding war with AT&T Inc. for Straight Path Communications Inc., a tiny company that controls a vast swath of airwaves considered vital for the fifth generation of wireless services, or 5G.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
